metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5380 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
The Quagga BGP daemon (bgpd) prior to version 1.2.3 can overrun internal BGP code-to-string conversion tables used for debug by 1 pointer value, based on input.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5380` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

quagga - 0.99.24.1-2ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: quagga package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.99.24.1-2ubuntu1.4').
